name: Change Out of Stock Text for Woocommerce
author: Joseph Parry

sections.description:
Change Out of Stock Text for Woocommerce

This plugin lets you change the text in your Woocommerce store that describes the availability of your products.

This free version will let you alter the default text for when a product is in stock, out of stock or low stock. You can include the current stock of a product by typing $stock$ within the text, to make this work make sure your products have a stock quantity.

Priorities

Leaving a setting blank will mean other text is used, the priorities of options are below. If backorders are allowed, the in stock text will be used.

  • In stock: (your in stock default text)->(Woocommerce in stock default text)
  • Out of stock: (your out of stock default text)->(woocommerce default out of stock default text)
  • Low stock: (your low stock text)->(your in stock text)->(woocommerce low stock text)

Pro Version

Once released the pro version will add more options, allowing you to better control availability information. These include:

  • Giving specific text to products
  • Adding links to your text
  • Specifying the text displayed when backorders are allowed
  • Specifying the text used to notify a user when a backorder is used

short_description: Change the text that describes product availability in your Woocommerce store.
